p: With the colony Cx. pipiens from Tabarka, RVFV started to be detected at day 3 pi with a TR of 10% and 1.3±0.2 log 10PFU in saliva ( Figure 2B). TR remained steady until day 14 pi and reached a maximum of 40% at day 21 pi. The number of infectious particles was at its highest level at day 6 pi with 1.6±0.4 log 10PFU and decreased from day 9 to day 21 pi. As a compromise, we chose to estimate DIR and TR at day 14 and day 21 pi when mosquitoes were exposed to RVFV.
